channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: For God So Loved The World
channel.desc: There are 7 testimonies to Jesus in the Gospel of John; 7 instances where Jesus claims His divinity, eg, I am the Bread of Life; I am the Light of the World. In Episode # 2, we start with John 1: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Little Flower
channel.desc: Fr. Jaques Daley discusses how St. Therese of Lisieux approached her relationships with others. Christ was at the center of her relationships, and we need this in all relationships that we have. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saint Faustina: Divine Mercy In Our Souls
channel.desc: Fr. Joe Roesch interviews Fr. Ron Pytel, whose miraculous healing led to the canonization of St. Faustina. The Lord told Faustina to pray especially for priests, because when priests proclaim his mercy, even the most hardened sinners will crumble. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother discusses how God?s transforming presence makes us more like Christ. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch examines the lack of benefits the Egyptians, Assyrians and Babylonians gained from the subjugation and exile of the people of Israel, and to what this is testimony. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Divine Child Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite the litany of the Divine Child Jesus from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fr. Apostoli: Mother Teresa, Servant Of The Poor
channel.desc: They are for Mother Teresa, the possibility to give back something to Jesus. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn On Location
channel.desc: From the Blue Army Shrine for Our Lady, Sr. Faustina Maria Pia, SV shares the hope Our Lady brings. In Sydney Australia Matt Fradd explains Our Lady as the New Arc of the Covenant. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Dr. Greg and Lisa Popcak continue their conversation about nurturing a lifelong Catholic faith, explaining how their program is making a profound difference in Catholic families. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Domestic Church
channel.desc: Dr. Joseph Atkinson continues his inquiry into the nature of the family as a domestic church, looking to the creation account in the book of Genesis to see is there is an inherent structure and meaning God has given to the family. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholics, The Bible & The Early Church
channel.desc: Father Harold Cohen S.J. examines what the Bible has to say in regard to how man achieves salvation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chesterton Station
channel.desc: In a game of make-believe, old friend George Bernard Shaw faces off against G.K. Chesterton in a Wild Western movie. But as these two cowboys are about to draw their weapons, a handshake and a laugh settles the dispute. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Chris connects proof of God to the insights of St. Thomas Aquinas. Hear about the work the Order of Malta does for the sick, imprisoned and those effected by natural disasters. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Get A Life In Christ
channel.desc: Fr. Groeschel talks how to respect our church leaders and how to approach them when we disagree with them. He uses scripture references about how we should deal with priests and bishops. He discusses about why the pope might be putting up with all the straying away and disobedience that's going on in the church right now. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Fr. Leo Clifford explains that the Lord sees individuals, not groups, when He looks at us. He is very deeply in love with each person, caring unbelievably about each of us. He cared so much that Jesus became man to redeem us. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Vaticano
channel.desc: Central Asia?s first laywoman up for beatification. The connection between Cardinal John Henry Newman and AI, and, how the Jubilee of Education celebrates him as Doctor of the Church. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Iceland, ?echoes Of The Creator?
channel.desc: In this last frontier of civilization, women and men of faith discover special blessings in the beautiful yet harsh environment of Iceland, provoking admiration for God?s creation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: We Are Catholic
channel.desc: Fr. Charles prays for the intercession of St. Claire for Sr. Lali?s mission in the Philippines. Phillip is confused, and doesn?t understand why he can?t just pray directly to Jesus, but learns why after the owner of the cookie factory comes for dinner. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Children's Rosary
channel.desc: Children gather to pray and learn more about the five Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary: The Resurrection, The Ascension, The Descent of the Holy Spirit, The Assumption, and The Coronation of Mary. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Savoring Our Faith
channel.desc: Journey with Fr. Leo Patlinghug as he explores sacred sites in the City of Lights, highlighting the Catholic heart of Paris as he visits Notre Dame Cathedral and Sainte-Chapelle. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Jim and Joy read comments and take calls about the current status of the Pro-Life movement across the United States. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Rosary With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Mother Angelica and the Poor Clares of Perpetual Adoration recite the Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Live Adoration From Ewtn Chapel
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! On The Road
channel.desc: Tom Neary continues his conversation with Adian Gallagher about Ireland?s International Eucharistic and Marian Shrine in Knock, County Mayo, the site of an Apparition in 1879. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother discusses how God?s transforming presence makes us more like Christ. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Glorious Mysteries of the Resurrection, Ascension, Pentecost, Assumption and The Coronation of May help us to receive the graces of faith in the Eternal Life, desire for Heaven, docility to the Holy Spirit, a holy death and the Communion of Saints. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: An Ewtn Holy Land Experience
channel.desc: Fr. Joseph and Fr. Mark reflect on the life of Mary as they visit the sites blessed by the presence of the Mother of God. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Coming To Christ
channel.desc: Host Susan Conroy explains how at the Mass, we are not only receiving Jesus Christ Himself in Holy Communion and but we are hearing His Words of everlasting life. Part Two. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Brazil: ?querida Amazonia?
channel.desc: For over 23 years, Fr. Piotr Schewior has worked as a missionary in the Amazon jungle to aid communities as they struggle with alcoholism, pedophilia, drug abuse and deforestation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fields And Faith
channel.desc: Bob Dolan invites NFL wide receiver Chris Horn to discuss how his Catholic faith played a large role in his career and how his faith remains front-and-center in his life after football. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch examines the lack of benefits the Egyptians, Assyrians and Babylonians gained from the subjugation and exile of the people of Israel, and to what this is testimony. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Nicaragua: ?lord, Grant Us Peace?
channel.desc: Follow Catholic leadership and youth in the fall-out of pension reform in Nicaragua, to know the ongoing political repression, efforts for peace, and suffering of the faithful. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: From The Heart, With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Mother explains using John and Psalms 116 and 117 that God?s love is steadfast and his faithfulness endures forever. Union with God is the key to our happiness and peace, and is what Jesus desires for all his followers. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Jim and Joy welcome Megan Alexander, TV host and bestselling author, to speak about connection during the Christmas season, and her newest book ?The True Gifts of Christmas.?. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Doctors Of The Church
channel.desc: Destined for a political career, St. Ambrose of Milan instead made serving God his life?s mission. As one of our greatest bishops, he defended the authentic teachings of the Church and opened up Scripture to the masses. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Perou : Les Huit Meres
channel.desc: Au d?but des ann?es 1980, une organisation r?volutionnaire communiste appel?e Sendero Luminoso ? Sentier lumineux ? a lanc? une op?ration terroriste brutale dans les r?gions rurales des Andes p?ruviennes, utilisant la terreur sans piti?. L'arm?e envoy?e pour combattre le groupe terroriste a ?galement fait un usage excessif de la force, d?truisant des villages et tuant de nombreux civils innocents. En 2003, ? la fin de 20 ans d'insurrection, plus de 70 000 personnes ?taient mortes ou avaient disparu. Encore aujourd'hui, les traumatismes occasionn?s par ce conflit affectent profond?ment la vie quotidienne du peuple p?ruvien. La Congr?gation des S?urs missionnaires de J?sus Verbe et Victime apporte soins et r?confort ? ces r?gions ?loign?es. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Bob And Penny Lord Present
channel.desc: Bob and Penny Lord examine the life of St. Gemma Galgani, an Italian saint and mystic who bore the wounds of Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: They Might Be Saints Ven. Mary Angeline Teresa McCrory O. Carm
channel.desc: Mary Angeline Teresa McCrory?s life of holiness and service to the elderly poor has led to a groundswell of support for sainthood. Michael O?Neill looks at Mother McCrory's legacy and the miracles attributed to her. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch and Fr. Joseph Mary Wolfe discuss a series of meditations from Mother Angelica which offer wise advice on how to put Christ at the center of your holiday celebrations. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Long Ride Home With Bear Woznick
channel.desc: Bear Woznick and Tony Orband cross Florida, Alabama and Mississippi, following the same route that Bear once traveled on bicycle. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Footsteps Of St. Paul
channel.desc: Father Mitch Pacwa takes you to Athens, Greece where he discusses the First Letter of St. Paul to the Corinthians, chapters 2&3, and how the wisdom of God is revealed in mystery. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Father Mitch Pacwa gives short meditations on each of the Five Mysteries of Light introduced by Pope John Paul II. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Most Blessed Sacrament
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite a litany in honor of the Most Blessed Sacrament from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fr. Apostoli: Mother Teresa, Servant Of The Poor
channel.desc: Fr. Apostoli gives accounts of Mother Teresa's humility and her willingness to rely on God's Providence, even when success seemed unlikely to those around her. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: JonMarc Grodi and his guests address the personal obstacles, doctrinal objections, and the irresistible attraction to the Church Jesus founded 2,000 years ago. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Sr. M. Gianna Casino discusses the everlasting legacy of a mother, her significant role in her child?s life, and how she is often the first to introduce them to a life of faith. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Choices We Face
channel.desc: Scripture scholar and professor at Sacred Heart Major Seminary, Dr. Mary Healy discusses the Second Vatican Council, the development of doctrine, and charismatic spirituality. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: On The Road To Christ
channel.desc: Travel through beautiful New Mexico and Colorado with Bob Dolan, to explore the historic Loretto Chapel, Cathedral Basilica of St. Francis of Assisi, and the Mother Cabrini Shrine. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Papal Audience With Pope Leo Xiv
channel.desc: From the Vatican, Pope Leo XIV delivers his weekly address to the faithful. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Wild Goose
channel.desc: Fr. Dave Pivonka, TOR, describes what it means to be baptized in the Holy Spirit and how it brings a special transforming grace. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford discusses the theme of harboring grudges, resentments, gossip and other nasty habits that are disastrous to us personally and to all the others involved. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Explore With The Miracle Hunter
channel.desc: The story behind Ireland's greatest female saint. Known for her generosity, Brigid consecrated herself to Jesus and sparked the light of faith that still illuminates Ireland today. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Nicaragua: ?lord, Grant Us Peace?
channel.desc: Follow Catholic leadership and youth in the fall-out of pension reform in Nicaragua, to know the ongoing political repression, efforts for peace, and suffering of the faithful. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Adventure Catechism
channel.desc: Learn about Baptism, the amazing sacrament that cleanses us from Original Sin, and makes us members of Christ. And see how the sacrament of Confirmation empowers us to change the world just like the Apostles did. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Hi Lucy
channel.desc: Sister Grace Explains to Lucy that this is one of the seven virtues, a charitable behavior is always something practiced by saints and we should follow their example. (16 minutes).[(96057)]
